'''Grand Frog Chorus''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Forest of Blessings]], [[Simulanka]]. With this mechanic, the player controls a single origami frog in a chorus of multiple frogs. The player must control the frog to jump according to the tempo of the other frogs' jumps.
